scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run -w apps/api dev" "npm run -w apps/web dev"
scripts.dev:all: taskkill /IM node.exe /F >nul 2>&1 || echo. && npm run -w apps/api dev & npm run -w apps/web dev
scripts.build: npm run -w apps/web build && npm run -w apps/api build
scripts.start:all: npm run -w apps/api start & npm run -w apps/web start
scripts.kill-nodes: taskkill /IM node.exe /F || echo 'No Node.js processes found'
